Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

Product Description

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style. EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

★ THE COMPLETE WALL ORGANIZER FOR OFFICE: Everything you need for a mail organizer including the wall mount, all in one place. Super easy installation. Start using this wall file organizer right away to hold documents, files, notebooks and more all in one place for easy access. Perfect for the home office, the classroom or anywhere that you need a large wall organizer that’s durable and can hold serious weight without falling, bowing, bending or breaking.
★ THE ULTIMATE WALL HANGING FILE FOLDER ORGANIZER: No assembly needed. Just hang and use right away. This hanging mail organizer is attractive enough to use as a file holder wall mounted or as a standing file organizer if you wish. Comes in your choice of 3 colors, making it a great way to organize bills, tablets, notebooks, portfolios, photos, coloring books, magazines and so much more. Ideal as a hanging desk organizer too, with ample storage for your phone or digital devices underneath.
★ FITS IN TIGHT SPACES: Measures 12.5(l) x 4(w) x 16(h) inches but fits easily in tight or narrow spaces. Multi-use all paper holder for all your documents. The tray underneath also holds pens, notepads, staplers, bookmarks and more within easy reach, making it great for sorting mail, bills, photos, files, papers, magazines and more. Also great for storing cookbooks and recipes in the kitchen. The possibilities are virtually endless!
★ MULTI COLOR, MULTI PURPOSE: This hanging wall file organizer comes in three colors; professional black, white and grey. They are great for homeschooling or for use in the classroom as a vertical fil organizer Simple divider sections keep items in this vertical file organizer separated yet easy to reach when needed. Get rid of paper clutter and keep your space neat, tidy and organized with this all-in-one hanging wall organizer!
★ NEVER LOSE A BILL AGAIN: This sturdy wall file holder makes a great wall mail organizer and is durable enough to hold a considerable number of bills, papers, magazines and more. Organize incoming and outgoing mail, bills and other documents while keeping papers orderly. No more disorganized stacks of paper or an overflowing inbox. With NEATERIZE on your side, you’ve got it all accessible and under control.

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

  • ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected
  • DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style.
  • EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.

Product Description

Sinboun is a U.S. brand which aims to provide efficient and functional work or home office storage. A brand who prides ourselves on the high level of customer care that we offer.

Sinboun organizer is committed to creating a functional, comfortable and efficient office or home storage solution for you.

Sinboun Desktop File Organizer

With a contemporary and elegant design this tray organizer will enhance your workspace and complements any decoration. Sinboun file organizer is a desk organizer accessory for your office or home, this desk organizer keep your home and desk neat and tidy.

Made of Strong Black Metal Mesh Ideal for the Office or Home Creative & Versatile Letter Tray With Handle Classical Look and large Capacity Easy to Install & Instruction Manual Included Round Surface Edges – No Sharp Corners

Multi-purpose Tray Organizer for Your Office or Home

Sturdy design to store any A4or letter size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more. A great start to re-organise your current files and endless paperwork, use our desk organizer to increase your efficiency at work.

Paper sorting and storage rack has plenty of room for your documents and folders and is crafted out of metal, to hold more weight.The top platform, keep your documents and stationery in order.

If you want an office file organizer that blends in with any decoration, this 5 tier letter tray organizer is perfect for you. Sturdy design to store any letter or A4 size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more.
